Threat Description: Stolen/forged JWT replay leads to unauthorized API access
Recommended Mitigation: Strict OIDC validation (iss/aud/exp) + short TTL + refresh rotation

Threat Description: AuthZ bypass due to misconfigured APIM policies or open routes
Recommended Mitigation: Deny-by-default routes + per-operation authZ + config checks

Threat Description: L7 DoS floods expensive endpoints and exhausts AKS
Recommended Mitigation: Rate limits/quotas + WAF bot protection + HPA + timeouts

Threat Description: Service trusts gateway only; missing in-service authZ checks
Workload identity misbinding allows wrong workload access
Recommended Mitigation: Per-service identities + least privilege + review bindings

Threat Description: Over-permissive IAM or network exposes SQL/Blob leading to exfiltration
Recommended Mitigation: Private endpoints + deny public access + scoped RBAC + egress controls

Threat Description: SQLi or SSRF chain leads to data access escalation
Recommended Mitigation: Parameterized queries + SSRF defenses + block link-local egress

Threat Description: Shared identity permits unauthorized secret reads
Recommended Mitigation: Per-service identity + least privilege vault policies

Threat Description: Secret tampering/rotation by privileged actor compromises runtime
Recommended Mitigation: Approval workflow + alerts on secret changes
Log redaction + never log tokens + DLP checks

Threat Description: Supply chain tampering introduces backdoored image
Recommended Mitigation: SBOM + image signing + provenance + CI policy gates

Threat Description: Deployer has cluster-admin leading to cluster takeover
Recommended Mitigation: Least-privilege RBAC for deployer + namespace separation
